snippet: A pro-government Alawite militia is believed responsible for killing scores of other Alawites. Survivors said that victims were killed by a group that had been professing to defend them.
abstract: Rights organizations researching massacre of Alawite Syrians say that members of pro-government Alawite militias were responsible; accusation, if confirmed, would be shocking episode of Alawite-on-Alawite violence in conflict punctuated by violence between sects.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and HANIA MOURTADA
byline.contributor: Liam Stack reported from New York, and Hania Mourtada from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: A pro-government Alawite militia is believed responsible for killing scores of other Alawites. Survivors said that victims were killed by a group that had been professing to defend them.

headline.seo: Pro-Assad Alawites Blamed in Killings of Others in Sect
headline.main: Members of Assad’s Sect Blamed in Syria Killings
headline.print_headline: Members of Assad’s Sect Blamed in Syria Killings

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces
